content.question: Which of the following events would most likely lead to a decrease in the <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in the oceans?

choices.label: Decreased vehicular emissions from cars and trucks
Increased burning of fossil fuels in power plants
Increased rates of photosynthesis in terrestrial ecosystems

content.answer: Increased burning of fossil fuels in power plants

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
